docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 2 (AP)-- The Government approved today a plan whereby American oil companies operating abroad may act jointly to offset world-wide petroleum shortages.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 2 (AP)-- The Government approved today a plan whereby American oil companies operating abroad may act jointly to offset world-wide petroleum shortages.
docs.abstract: US approves plan for joint action by 19 US cos with overseas operations to offset shortages; cos listed

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 4--With the passage and signing at last of the long embattled economic-controls legislation, the Senate and House are again setting their sights for an adjournment of the first session of the Eighty-second Congress.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 4--With the passage and signing at last of the long embattled economic-controls legislation, the Senate and House are again setting their sights for an adjournment of the first session of the Eighty-second Congress.

headline.main: WEARY CONGRESS STILL HAS MOUNTAIN OF WORK; Three Big 'Must' Items and Many Others Will Delay Adjournment
